General.Name: seha corporation
General.Description: seha corporation operates in the paperboard industry in South Korea. The company offers industrial papers, including duplex boards with gray back, uncoated duplex boards with gray back, coated pizza box boards, duplex boards with white back, folding box boards, SBS-two side coated, cast coated papers, and cast white boards; and food wrapping/functional papers, such as solid bleached high bulk, kraft liner boards, coated fresh SC, and carrier boards. It also provides fancy papers, including glacis; and transfer papers, such as quick dry and sticky type sublimation inkjet papers. seha corporation exports its products to 20 countries. The company was formerly known as Serim Paper Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to seha corporation in 2007. seha corporation was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.
